name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of experience in driving B2B sales and fostering strategic customer relationships within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in leveraging CRM systems and sales productivity tools to enhance customer engagement and streamline sales processes. My expertise includes developing strategic account plans and delivering impactful communication to clients, ensuring their needs are met effectively. 

I use analytical skills to identify opportunities for condition monitoring and plant asset management, contributing to increased sales productivity. With a strong foundation in technical integration, I combine my sales strategies with a robust understanding of **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to craft personalized solutions that resonate with clients. I excel in team collaboration, thereby enhancing project outcomes through effective communication. My problem-solving abilities have enabled me to lead initiatives that bridge technology and sales, ensuring client satisfaction and loyalty.
